description: Borrowed from Latin relevāns, relevāntem, present active participle of relevō (“lift up again, lighten, relieve”), from re- (“again”) + levō (“lift”).

adjectives.description: relevant (comparative more relevant, superlative most relevant)

definitionGroups.group: Related, connected, or pertinent to a topic.

entries.meaning: (Usually and especially) Directly related, connected, or pertinent, with important ramifications or implications.
examples: His mother provided some relevant background information concerning his medical condition.
